description: Whip up this vibrant pink breakfast smoothie recipe that takes 10 minutes to make. With chilled watermelon and yoghurt, it's perfect for summer.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2021,Watermelon,Peanut free
name: Watermelon Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Greekstyle yoghurt (to serve, swirled through)

recipeInstructions.text: Place watermelon, raspberries and lime juice in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth. Serve with yoghurt swirled through.
